thread.title: Jennifer Lopez's Valentine's Day Look Was as Red-Hot as Can Be
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez's Valentine's Day Look Was as Red-Hot as Can Be

title: Jennifer Lopez's Valentine's Day Look Was as Red-Hot as Can Be
text:
BY: Brandi Fowler 
Jennifer Lopez 's valentine was one lucky guy ... and it's clear he knew it. 
After sharing a snap of the extravagant display of floral arrangements—and a chocolate cake—she received for Valentine's Day, the "Ain't Your Mama" songstress showed off the sultry two-piece ensemble she wore to make her valentine melt. 
"About last night... Valentine's day outfit. #redofcourse #highponytails #hoops," she captioned the snap, which showed her flashing a smize at the camera rocking a cropped red top and showing off her famous bum in matching high-waist pants. A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 15, 2017 at 12:52pm PST 
As she mentioned, J.Lo completed her look with her locks swooped up into a high ponytail, paired with silver hoops and a neutral lip.
